content: साम्यं {@--1@} Equality, sameness, evenness; <ls>Ku. 5. 31.</ls> {@--2@} Likeness, resemblance, similarity; स्पष्टं प्रापत्साम्यमुवींधरस्य <ls>Śi. 18. 38</ls>; <ls>H. 1. 45</ls>; <ls>Ki. 17. 51.</ls> {@--3@} Equability. {@--4@} Concord, harmony. {@--5@} Indifference, impartiality, sameness of view; येषां साम्ये मनः स्थितं <ls>Bg. 5. 19.</ls>
